      Welcome to jhuTASA

      Meet Board Sign up for Taste of Taiwan Fam Requirements

      We are the Taiwanese American Student Association at Johns Hopkins University (TASA)!
      Our mission is to promote Taiwanese culture, community, and connection among students. On this site, you will find more information about our events and members!
